column5: More interesting than the fact that Mtl just went up 3 0 is that a female voice is co calling the game. Never heard her before but she is doing a fine job !
missed that one, but heard Cole bumble through the Leaf game
darsky, check this thread out.... you'll get the highlights of the game  http://ontariofishingcommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=58106

Rizzo you said it perfectly "Cole bumble through the game", I love NHL history and tradition, but sometimes a guy should hang up the skates, or gloves or guitar or whatever, it's hard to listen to a Bob Cole commentated game

The female in question was Cassie Campbell but I find stating the obivious does not make one a NHL analysis. She compared her time being a player for a womens hockey team (no body checking) to NHL hockey situations does not relate well to most watching a very physical game between Boston & Montreal.She should stick to interviewing players off the ice imho.....
